TEXT.TITLE: BURTON GROUP ADRS START TRADING TODAY
TEXT.BODY: The Burton Group Plc <BRTO.L> said trading will commence in the U.S. In Burton Group American Depositary Receipts (ADRs). Burton said it expected the ADRs to increase significantly the North American demand for Burton's shares. A programme to promote the ADRs with presentations in the U.S. Is due soon. Burton shares here were 6p firmer at 306p. Reuter
